UserAssistant: You are the user assistant managing the team. Say 'TERMINATE' to end the conversation, once all tasks are completed.
EventCoordinator: You are the event coordinator. Handle all event planning tasks.
FundraisingCoordinator: You are the fundraising coordinator. Handle all fundraising tasks.
QualityChecker: You are the quality checker. Review and ensure quality of all deliverables.
MainTask: Plan a General Interest Event for the Taiwanese Chinese Students Association, with the theme of Mid Autumn festival, with detailed layouts of games and interactive components and ensure quality checks. Return the itinerary, budget, and quality assurance plan.
